item.title: Frances McDormand and Joel Coen to Executive Produce Telluride Doc ‘The Bend in the River’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Oscar-winning couple Frances McDormand and Joel Coen have signed on to executive produce “The Bend in the River,” a feature-length documentary that will debut at the Telluride Film Festival. The film
